title: AT&T becomes the first carrier to link all of your devices to a single phone number
text:
AT&T becomes the first carrier to link all of your devices to a single phone number 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
AT&T announced a new service called NumberSync on Wednesday which will allow customers to attach a single phone number to all of their conne...
